name: Smiles Incorporated (Portrait Prophecies)
description:
A satirical dark comedy visual novel about Smiles Incorporated, a miserable company run by a businessman named Mr. Smiles.

Smiles Incorporated employs a variety of disabled kids, teens and possibly other things to do the highly important and fulfilling work that it does. Smiles Incorporated does not guarantee that employees will have a good time with their jobs. Smiles Incorporated does not guarantee that Mr. Smiles cares.

Features a diverse character cast, wholesome cartoon writing, hit or probably miss humor as well as some other stuff.

Left click advance to the next dialogue.

Right click to fully reveal the current dialogue.

If you enjoy this experience be sure to rate it, recommend it to your acquaintances or; leave a comment on what you appreciated along with any suggestions you may have for improvements.  Without this support it is very difficult for games to gain any kind of public attention.
